Package com.interzoid.sdk.api.exceptions

package com.interzoid.sdk.api.exceptions
This package contains the custom exceptions used by the API SDK.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.interzoid.sdk.api
    This package contains the classes that implement the Interzoid API SDK.
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientErrorException
    Exception thrown when the API returns a 4xx error code, indicating client-side errors.
    InterzoidApiException
    Exception thrown when the API returns an error code.
    ServerErrorException
    Exception thrown when the API returns a 5xx error code, indicating server-side errors.
    UnexpectedResponseException
    Exception thrown when the API returns an unexpected response.
    ValidationException
    Exception thrown when request validation fails.
